alert.note: Alert for Western Mineral (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued November 29 at 1:35PM EST until December 01 at 4:00AM EST by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 8 AM WEDNESDAY TO 4 AM EST THURSDAY... * WHAT...West winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph. The strongest winds will be above 2,500 feet elevation. * WHERE...In Maryland, Garrett and Extreme Western Allegany Counties. In West Virginia, Western Mineral County. * WHEN...From 8 AM Wednesday to 4 AM EST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
